labels.value:
• Name - Template Name.
  • Description - An explanation of how the template should be used.
  • Skip weekends - Allows you to automatically reschedule a task that would fall on a Saturday or a Sunday to either a Monday or Friday. When checked, a drop down box appears allowing you to select the day.
  • Action - Click "X" to eliminate a step in a template.
  • Subject - What the task is to do.
  • Task Dependency - The depended task will only be created once the controlling task is completed.
